name: CIA SMASH
description:
In "CIA SMASH" you play as a cyborg with telekinetic powers. Your goal be the super villain you are and wipe out as many cia member's as you can before they wipe YOU out. You play using the wasd keys and the mouse. To get rid of a cia member left click on them and don't let go of your mouse button. This will put them in the air above your head. They will stop attacking you. Then point your mouse at another cia member and let go of the mouse key. The cia member currently floating will be thrown at your enemies. Hope everyone enjoys the game

("yes this is a ludum dare game and only has 3 maps (the reason it costs 1$ is it is in the October challenge in witch you have 4weeks to make a game and also make 1$ )")
